name: mcp-agentic-fun

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:tools && npm run test:full
scripts.ui:enhanced: node server.cjs && echo 'Enhanced UI available at http://localhost:3000/enhanced'
scripts.all: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start" "npm run ui"
scripts.demo: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start" "npm run ui" && echo 'Visit http://localhost:3000/enhanced for the enhanced UI'

description: MCP Agentic Development Platform - Comprehensive MCP development environment with interactive visualizations, multiple client interfaces, and advanced agentic capabilities
